meanings.definition: The action of separating something into parts or groups.
meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the divisions of the class into smaller study groups.
meanings.sent2: The divisions of the puzzle made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent3: The divisions in the cake caused a funny mix-up at the party.
meanings.sent4: The divisions in the road led to different destinations.
meanings.sent5: The clear divisions in the sand made it easy to see where the beach ended.

meanings.definition: A disagreement or conflict between two or more groups.
meanings.sent1: The divisions between the two teams led to a heated argument.
meanings.sent2: Political divisions can sometimes hinder progress.
meanings.sent3: The divisions over the movie choice made for a lively debate.
meanings.sent4: The divisions in opinions created tension within the group.
meanings.sent5: The divisions in beliefs caused a rift between friends.

meanings.definition: A separate section or part of something.
meanings.sent1: The book is divided into different divisions for easy reference.
meanings.sent2: Each division of the store sells specific items.
meanings.sent3: The divisions of the garden create a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent4: The divisions of the city showcase its diverse culture.
meanings.sent5: The divisions of the painting highlight different aspects of the artist's style.
